title: Classic Movie Soundtracks
description: The music that made the movies unforgettable! Test your knowledge of iconic film scores and soundtracks.

questions.question: Who composed the iconic two-note 'Jaws' theme that made audiences afraid to go in the water?
The haunting zither music in 'The Third Man' (1949) was performed by which musician?
Which composer created the memorable scores for 'Star Wars,' 'Indiana Jones,' and 'E.T.'?
'Moon River' from 'Breakfast at Tiffany's' (1961) was written by Henry Mancini and which lyricist?
Bernard Herrmann composed the screeching violin score for which famous 1960 shower scene?
Ennio Morricone composed the iconic whistling theme for which Clint Eastwood western?
options: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

questions.question: The 'Saturday Night Fever' (1977) soundtrack featured songs primarily by which group?
Which film featured 'As Time Goes By,' performed by Dooley Wilson at Sam's piano?
Max Steiner composed one of the first great film scores for which 1933 monster movie?
The song 'Raindrops Keep Fallin' on My Head' appears in which 1969 film?
options: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid

questions.question: Which 1965 film features the song 'My Favorite Things' sung by Julie Andrews?
Nino Rota composed the famous waltz theme for which 1972 epic crime film?
Which Simon and Garfunkel song is prominently featured in 'The Graduate' (1967)?
The 'Grease' soundtrack spent how many weeks at number one on the Billboard album chart in 1978?
Which composer wrote the stirring theme for 'Gone with the Wind' (1939)?
